text: Cheap razors that will cut up your face. No thanks lol
@leanneyhunter  @rebeckyjayne  dont you 2 "adults" have anything better to do than argue on instagram. Crybabies 😂. Please show the conversation to an adult so they can laugh at you.
Looks great! ✅
@leanneyhunter actually please just go, you have to save all of the oppressed men.

@leanneyhunter oh good, attack me personally because you chose to respond to my comment and you’re not liking my responses because they differ from yours. If you can’t take the heat - don’t engage with people on social media.

@rebeckyjayne Seriously, your attitude is a joke, you must be a terrible nurse. Do they not teach professionalism and integrity over there? Go find someone else to pester for their beliefs. Or tell some girls how they should act. I’m done with this.

@leanneyhunter why are you asking me if we are finished? You are free to stop responding at anytime, I’m not your mother. You were the one who chose to respond to my comment, not the other way around. I’m sorry you think anyone who has a difference of opinion than you is arguing with you. But yes, continue your crusade to lift men above the oppression they have been suffering at the hands of women since the beginning of time 👏🏻 god speed.

@rebeckyjayne okay. So can we finish now. Please? You asked me a question and I gave you my answer but you obv looking to argue and I’m really not into that. It’s somebody else’s post and the notifications will be driving them wild. Thank you for sharing your perspective, I will continue to support the most disadvantaged in our society.
@leanneyhunter so you think men are oppressed? I wish you knew what feminism was - it’s about equality, it’s not about one sex being supreme over another....
@leanneyhunter people like you - as in people who try to pit others against each other. I’m speaking directly to the words you typed and posed on this thread.

@rebeckyjayne people like me?
You’re supposed to be a nurse, don’t bring disability into this please.

@rebeckyjayne No I’m not a historian you are correct. I studied a midwifery degree not a history degree. I genuinely just care about here and now, I worry about the men who are oppressed in the developed world and people’s inability to see it.
I feel the advert portrays a harmful stigma and don’t really have anything else to add to that.

I don’t like feminism, I feel it is only for a certain type of woman but damaging to a whole lot of others. We’ve seen grid girls loose their jobs, page 3 models with no work etc all through feminism. It’s just not for me.

I’m always happy to listen to both sides and enter into a healthy debate but I think we will have to agree to disagree on this one.
@rebeckyjayne okay!

@leanneyhunter and there are probably some mentally ill people who claim all men are bad, just like there are people who claim all women are bad. People like you need to stop with this garbage of pitting people against each other and jump off the extremist wagon. Just because people say “we need to stand up for women’s rights” does not mean “all men are bad”. That’s the nonsense that needs to stop.
@artoftatoo just seen your page, I’m gonna follow it too.

@leanneyhunter whoa this ad didn’t condemn men! It’s insane to me how much you twisted it into that. You are clearly not a historian. And we can focus on women’s rights and men’s rights at the same time, it doesn’t have to be one or the other. Feminism is just that, equal opportunity amongst the sexes. I’m sorry social media has given you the wrong idea on feminism and that a few extremists group has clouded the real meaning of feminism. Should I allow the few extremist Christians to cloud my views of all Christians?

@rebeckyjayne I’ve posted this elsewhere but will post it again because this bothers me. As a registered nurse you should understand the concept of advocating for those you feel are not being treated humanely.
It’s so wrong how men are discriminated against and stereotyped like this. No wonder suicide is such a problem. They are let down constantly by society and feminists. 👤 The majority of suicide victims are male.
👤 There are many more men sleeping rough on the streets than women.
👤 The prison population is mostly male.
👤 Men are much more likely to have dropped out of school and have no qualifications compared to women.
👤 You never hear of an all male shortlist when a company recruits.
👤 Females are protected against genital mutilation, nobody cares when boys are circumcised without consent and for absolutely no medical reason.
👤 Nearly all domestic violence shelters are for women.
👤 If a woman leaves the family home with her child, she is escaping. If a man takes his own child he is kidnapping them.
👤 Only a women could be raped according to our law.

I could go on for hours. We need equality for all, not feminism and all that rubbish. This has got to stop. Men are not all bad people, they deserve equality.
@bigboxofrazors I’ll stick with dollar shave club. I don’t see them supporting men who are losing their mind over an ad that basically says don’t be dicks. ✌🏻

@rebeckyjayne I’ve literally never seen an advert which condems women and pigeonholes them like that.
I also don’t see the relevance of who I “claim” to follow. Being a Christian does not equate to hating men. I believe I’m a good person and I stand for what I believe is right. This feminist rubbish is going too far, it’s about time we focused on men’s rights.

@leanneyhunter how is the ad painting everyone with the same brush? It doesn’t say “all men”, does it? No one has claimed that all men are assholes, no one. There are numerous ads out there that tell women to be their best - dress this way, dress that way, act like this, do this, do that....no one blinks an eye at those ads. But ONE ad does the same to men and people lose their damn minds!

@leanneyhunter how is the ad painting everyone with the same brush? It doesn’t say “all men”, does it? No one has claimed that all men are assholes, no one. There are numerous ads out there that tell women to be their best - dress this way, dress that way, act like this, do this, do that....no one blinks an eye at those ads. But ONE ad does the same to men and people lose their damn minds!

@rebeckyjayne Please don’t make assumptions about me based on my beliefs, I don’t agree with stereotyping or stigma, the same reason why I don’t like that advert. The overall message is a good one but has been portrayed very poorly. It’s harmful to paint everyone with the same brush.
Imagine if an anti terrorism advert focused on one particular religion even though the majority are good people, it’s the exact same scenario here.
@rebeckyjayne use coupon code FREEDOM for free shipping, we sell good disposable razors.
@rebeckyjayne I’ve been responding to people on both sides. Free advertising.

@bigboxofrazors oh really? Well that’s interesting because if you were targeting everyone then you wouldn’t be responding to only the men who are all upset over an ad that basically promotes them not being assholes, but ok👌🏻.
@leanneyhunter riddle me this - why was that ad so offensive to you? Anyone who claims to follow God wouldn’t be offended over an ad that promotes people to “be best”.

I can advertise you on my page @artoftatoo
Send direct message if you are interested.

Sensible strategy. Gillette have alienated half of their customer base, if I were a competitor I’d take this opportunity to promote my business too.
Well done for not being a sheep, I hope your sales grow as a result of this.
We are targeting anyone who shaves
You’re targeting butt hurt men over the Gillette ad.
